name: Jumpees
description: Jumpees is a mobile, sweet and casual game about little sticker like creatures jumping down and up in order wallop them so you can unlock moreJumplings and new ways to prolong the game. Be carefull at red ones as they force you to adjust your tactics. The whole design is based on my youngest niece's felt-tip pen creature and it was hand drawn by me, my daughter and her cousins.
